app_name: SoaringSafe Parental Control App and App Blocker
app_detail:
ğŸ¥‡The award winning parental control app and app blocker is now on Android!ğŸ¥‡

Lots of free forever features that other apps charge for 

The easiest and the only completely free forever way to filter adult content and violence


More free features than any other app. Finally, a parental control app that's easy to install and actually works! An app built by parents for parents. Features an app blocker, adult content blocker, bedtimes and more! 

SOARING SAFE FEATURES:
ğŸš¨ App Blocker
ğŸš§ Block 25 Million Adult Content and Violent Websites
âŒ›ï¸ Set a bedtime when the internet turns off 
ğŸ”Ÿ Block 10 different categories of harmful apps and websites
ğŸ“¡ Works on WiFi and Cell connections, and with all browsers
ğŸš¦ Block or Allow Custom Websites / Apps
ğŸš§ Filter Search Results 
ğŸ¥ Filter Online Videos
ğŸ“‹ Get internet usage reports for each child
ğŸ’¡ Super easy to install
ğŸš€ FAST! SoaringSafe is the fastest solution available and doesn't slow down the device. 

SUPPORTS ALL TYPES OF DEVICES
- Tablets and Phones
- All types of Operating Systems

BLOCK OR ALLOW WEBSITE AND APP CATEGORIES:
- Chat and Instant Message
- Sexually Explicit
- Entertainment
- Weapons
- Social Networking
- Shopping
- Alcohol & Tobacco
- Pirated Content
- Gambling
- Hacking
- Online Forums
- Dating & Personals
- Illegal Drugs

LOTS OF FREE FOREVER FEATURES, NO SUBSCRIPTION REQUIRED:
- Protect Unlimited Devices
- Block 25 Million Adult Content and Violent Websites
- Filter Search and YouTube
- Set a bedtime when the internet turns off 
- Block 10 different categories of harmful apps and websites

SoaringSafe offers a Premium Plan available as an in-app purchase that is billed to your Google Play account. The premium plan unlocks all of SoaringSafe's features including:
- Block Individual Apps
- Custom Block and Allow
- Block Viruses and Malware
- Expanded Reporting

Users may purchase a monthly ($4.99) or yearly ($41.99) auto-renewing subscription which is charged to your account after any applicable free trial period. You will be billed monthly or yearly within 24 hours of the end of the current billing period. You may cancel anytime by going to the user's Account Settings. To avoid being billed for an additional period, subscriptions must be cancelled at least 24 hours before the end of the current period.
